body.description: Bandai brings Netflix's Stranger Things to life with these detailed figures, paying homage the 80’s.Fans and collectors alike can bring home their favorite characters AND MONSTERS from this series that captivated audiences and became a global phenomenon.Hyper detailed 11 inch figureHyper detailed 11 inch figureStriking likeness to the monster in the seriesCollectible packagingAges 8+Product contains small parts considered to be a choking hazard

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Bandai Namco exists to share dreams, fun and inspiration with people around the world. Connecting people and societies in the enjoyment of uniquely entertaining products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for Any Stranger Things Fan!
reviews.reviewText: If you're a fan of Stranger Things like me, then the Bandai Stranger Things Eddie Hawkins Figure Collection is an absolute must-have for your collection! I recently purchased this 6" figure and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.First of all, the attention to detail on this figure is truly remarkable. From Eddie Hawkins' iconic costume to his perfectly sculpted facial features, it's clear that Bandai has put a lot of effort into recreating this character. The paint job is flawless and the figure feels incredibly solid and well-made.What really sets this figure apart from others is the number of accessories it comes with. Eddie Hawkins is equipped with a walkie-talkie, flashlight, and even a miniature copy of his beloved Dungeons & Dragons game. These accessories add an extra layer of authenticity and allow for endless display possibilities.The articulation on this figure is also top-notch. It has multiple points of articulation, allowing you to pose Eddie Hawkins in various dynamic positions. Whether you want him to be battling the Demogorgon or just casually standing with the rest of your Stranger Things collection, the possibilities are endless.Another aspect worth mentioning is the packaging. The figure comes in a beautifully designed box that is sturdy and collector-friendly. It includes a window display, which allows you to showcase the figure without having to open the box. This is perfect for those who prefer to keep their collectibles in pristine condition.In terms of price, I believe this figure offers great value for money. It's reasonably priced considering the quality and attention to detail it offers. Furthermore, Bandai is a reputable brand known for producing high-quality collectibles, so you can trust that you're getting a product that will stand the test of time.Overall, I couldn't be happier with the Bandai Stranger Things Eddie Hawkins Figure Collection. It's a fantastic addition to any Stranger Things fan's collection and is sure to impress both avid collectors and casual fans alike. If you're a fan of the show, don't hesitate to add this figure to your collection – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome figure, decent size
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for one of these for my nephew for Christmas. Of all the Demogorgon figures I searched through I though this one was the best. It was a really nice size too, not a tiny figure like others I've seen. He was really excited about receiving this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than you'd think
reviews.reviewText: Our son ordered this. High quality definitely. He felt like he went shopping in a Comic Book store. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Action figure
reviews.reviewText: My sister purchased this for my 9 year old son and it has since become his favorite toy. It’s posable and the details are amazing especially if you are a Stranger Things fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: She's cool. Very bendy. Iv never seen the toes of an action figure bend😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love it so much, but....
reviews.reviewText: I love the figure but he broke at the waist within five minutes of opening and trying to position him for the collectors shelf he was going on. I managed to fix him but I'm scared to try and pose him so he is just standing there with hands at his hips. It is a lovely figure though but not for a lot of posing (or playing for kids).

reviews.reviewerName: I finished this book in two weeks and as a Harry Potter hardcore fan myself I couldn't put the book down. Very light weight book. It's fanbased and I loved the play. Can't wait to see on stage
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and perfect for boys
reviews.reviewText: For those who has kids who loves Stranger things creatures and don't have to worry about losing pieces. I recommend ages from 5-10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The arm fell off of it the first 3 minutes
reviews.reviewText: It was just a toy made poorly
Llegó antes de tiempo y en excelentes condiciones

Hormis le packaging légèrement détérioré, la figurine est conforme et bien représentative, qualité de reproduction au dessus de mes attentes, surtout le visage qui est vraiment bien fait, en général sur ce genre de figurine le visage est approximatif !! Là, c'est VECNA ! Un regret, quand même, dix centimètres de plus, elle aurait été superbe !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy payment, quick delivery. Perfect present.
